completeListOfAbilities.name: Quick Dualcast
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
3-hit group 雷 magic BRV attack + group HP attack delivered 3 times
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
All targets: 4 turns 雷 Resist Down from first HP attack
Self: Grants special effect Earth Crystal's Light (grants party BRV each turn [including enemy turns; max 5 turns] based on cumulative HP damage dealt with Quick Dualcast)

ailments.name: Earth Crystal's Light (Fixed)
ailments.desc: Earth Crystal's Light (Fixed)

ailments.name: PK Resist Down
ailments.desc: 雷 Resist Down: Lowers 雷 resist (does not stack)

passives.name: BRV Initiative
passives.desc: Slightly raises SPD when BRV is at least 50% MAX BRV
passives.short_desc: BRV Initiative: Raises SPD

passives.name: Buffed Attack
passives.desc: Slightly raises ATK with active buffs
passives.short_desc: Buffed Attack: Raises ATK

passives.name: Master's Initiative
passives.desc: Slightly raises SPD with ability mastery
passives.short_desc: Master's Initiative: Raises SPD

passives.name: Quick Thunder (V)
passives.desc: Slightly raises turn rate for Thunder (V)
passives.short_desc: Quick Thunder (V): Raises turn rate of Thunder (V)

passives.name: Spite
passives.desc: BRV Attack becomes Critical if BRV at least INT BRV and target's BRV at least own BRV × 2\n*Also applies to abilities changed from BRV Attack
passives.short_desc: Spite: BRV Attack becomes critical hit

passives.name: Charged Thunder (V)
passives.desc: Thunder (V) use +1
passives.short_desc: Charged Thunder (V): Raises use count of Thunder (V)

passives.name: Quick Ray of Hope
passives.desc: Slightly raises turn rate for Ray of Hope
passives.short_desc: Quick Ray of Hope: Raises turn rate of Ray of Hope

passives.name: Rapid Speed
passives.desc: Slightly raises SPD for 1 turn upon inflicting Break
passives.short_desc: Rapid Speed: Raises SPD

passives.name: Undying Wish
passives.desc: Slightly raises SPD & INT BRV when ally's BRV is below their INT BRV
passives.short_desc: Undying Wish: Raises SPD、 INT BRV

passives.name: All Buffed Attack Boost
passives.desc: Moderately raises party's MAX BRV、 ATK with active buffs
passives.short_desc: All Buffed Attack Boost: Raises party's MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Ray of Hope Extension
passives.desc:
Ray of Hope use +1

Mastery requirement for Ray of Hope to become Ray of Hope+ reduced by 1

When using Ray of Hope、 Ray of Hope+:
 • Moderate boost to BRV granted based on own INT BRV
 • Slight Greater Damage boost、 duration +2
 • Slight ATK Up boost、 duration +2
 • Higher turn rate

HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (雷 magic BRV attack + HP attack) with mastery
passives.short_desc: Ray of Hope Extension: Boost to Ray of Hope

passives.name: Initial Mastery Speed
passives.desc: Moderately raises INT BRV、 slightly raises SPD with ability mastery
passives.short_desc: Initial Mastery Speed: Raises INT BRV、 SPD

passives.name: Thunder (V) Extension
passives.desc:
Thunder (V) use +3

Mastery requirement for Thunder (V) to become Thunder (V)+ reduced by 1

When using Thunder (V)、 Thunder (V)+:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 5; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Triggers additional HP attack after use

When using Thunder (V):
 • Self: 3 turns MAX BRV Up I

When using Thunder (V)+:
 • Moderate MAX BRV Up boost
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%

BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (2-hit 雷 magic BRV attack; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage) with mastery
passives.short_desc: Thunder (V) Extension: Boost to Thunder (V)

passives.name: Shatter Resonance
passives.desc: Slightly raises party's INT BRV、 MAX BRV
passives.short_desc: Shatter Resonance: Raises party's INT BRV、 MAX BRV

passives.name: All Advance Extension
passives.desc: When using All Advance:\n • Slight boost to party's increased stolen BRV limit
passives.short_desc: All Advance Extension: Boost to All Advance

passive.name: All Advance Growth
passive.desc: All Advance use +1\n\nAll Advance effect duration +2
passive.short_desc: All Advance Growth: Boost to All Advance

passive.name: All Bravery Break Hit
passive.desc: Grants party 20% of individual INT BRV when inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break once per turn
passive.short_desc: All Bravery Break Hit: Grants party BRV

passive.name: Spark of Hope
passive.desc:
When using Ray of Hope、 Ray of Hope+:
 • BRV bonus extended to party
 • Greater Damage extended to party、 duration+
 • ATK Up I duration+
 • Turn rate+
passive.short_desc: Spark of Hope: Boost to Ray of Hope

passive.name: Magic Surge
passive.desc:
When using Thunder (V)、 Thunder (V)+:
 • BRV damage boost
 • MAX BRV Up I duration+ with mastery
 • Self: 3 turns INT BRV Up I (6 turns with mastery)

passive.name: Inherited Powers
passive.desc: May equip EX ability Quick Dualcast
passive.short_desc: Inherited Powers: May equip Quick Dualcast

passives.name: Mighty Quick Dualcast
passives.desc: Slightly increases BRV damage dealt with Quick Dualcast
passives.short_desc: Mighty Quick Dualcast: Increases BRV damage dealt with Quick Dualcast

passives.name: Quick Dualcast Advance
passives.desc: Slightly raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV when using Quick Dualcast
passives.short_desc: Quick Dualcast Advance: Raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV when using Quick Dualcast

passives.name: Quick Dualcast Recast Up
passives.desc: Slightly raises recast speed of Quick Dualcast
passives.short_desc: Quick Dualcast Recast Up: Raises recast speed of Quick Dualcast

passive.name: Inherited Powers Extension
passive.desc: Boost to EX ability Quick Dualcast
passive.short_desc: Inherited Powers Extension: Boost to Quick Dualcast

passives.name: Quick Dualcast Force
passives.desc: When using Quick Dualcast:\n • Moderate BRV damage boost
passives.short_desc: Quick Dualcast Force: Boost to Quick Dualcast

passives.name: Thunder (V)+ Buff Starting
passives.desc: 6 turns INT BRV Up I、 MAX BRV Up III at start of quest
passives.short_desc: Thunder (V)+ Buff Starting: INT BRV Up I、 MAX BRV Up III at start of quest

passives.name: Inherited Powers Extension Attack Boost Up Recast MAX
passives.desc:
While equipping EX+ weapon Demon's Rod (V)+ or passive ability Inherited Powers Extension:
 • Slightly increased MAX BRV、 ATK

Full recast gauge at start of quest
passives.short_desc: Inherited Powers Extension Attack Boost Up Recast MAX: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK; full recast gauge at start of quest

passives.name: Quick Dualcast BRV Hit Plus Advance++
passives.desc:
When using Quick Dualcast:
 • Total BRV attack hit count increased by 3; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Slightly raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV

BRV Attack+ becomes BRV Attack++ (BRV attack hit count increased by 1; slightly increased cumulative BRV damage)

HP Attack+ becomes HP Attack++ (BRV attack hit count increased by 1; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%)
passives.short_desc: Quick Dualcast BRV Hit Plus Advance++: Boost to Quick Dualcast
